name: icon_button
docstring: A button designed specifically for usage with a single icon.

properties.name: as_child
properties.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

properties.name: high_contrast
properties.description:
Create a IconButton component.

        Args:
            *children: The children of the component.
            **props: The properties of the component.

        Raises:
            ValueError: If no children are passed.

        Returns:
            The IconButton component.

styling_props.name: radius
styling_props.description:
Create a IconButton component.

        Args:
            *children: The children of the component.
            **props: The properties of the component.

        Raises:
            ValueError: If no children are passed.

        Returns:
            The IconButton component.
